headline: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) Expands Luxurious Offerings In Costa Rica And India
summary: Last week, Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) expanded its luxury reach with the announcements of new JW Marriott resorts in Costa Rica and India. Despite these positive developments aimed at enhancing consumer experiences, Marriott's stock price saw a decline of around 2% over the period. This underperformance may have contrasted with broader market trends, as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq indices were slightly higher. The company's strategic moves in expanding its resorts are noteworthy, but...

headline: Holding On To Marriott Hotels As 2025 Recession Risk Paints Mixed Picture
summary: Marriott's rating reaffirmed: Diversified portfolio & growth pipeline show strength, but debt & cashflow lag. Click here to read my most recent analysis.

headline: Marriott International Signs Agreement with Mullen Real Estate Capital to Debut a JW Marriott All-Inclusive Resort in Costa Rica
summary: Marriott International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAR) announced today the signing of an agreement with Mullen Real Estate Capital to bring the JW Marriott brand to the shores of Costa Elena, an exclusive resort-residential community located in Guanacaste, Costa Rica. The hotel is expected to be one of the first JW Marriott all-inclusive resorts to open globally, highlighting the company's commitment to redefining luxury all-inclusive experiences by integrating the brand's signature focus on mindfulness, ex

headline: Marriott launches new resort in Jim Corbett National Park, India
summary: The new property features 99 rooms, boasting private balconies and large windows.
